definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: But the FTAA has been afflicted instead by international politics.
sentences.chinese: 但美洲自由贸易区遭受的是国际政治之苦。

sentences.english: Two years ago in Beijing, we launched the process to build a Free Trade Area of the Asia-Pacific (FTAAP).
sentences.chinese: 两年前，我们在北京启动亚太自由贸易区进程。

sentences.english: Each session is $75 per FTA member and $150 per non-member .
sentences.chinese: 每届会议是每自由贸易区成员和150元非会员75。

sentences.english: This “technopolis” is planned as a free-enterprise zone to attract the world’s best talent.
sentences.chinese: 这一“科技城”计划作为自由贸易区来吸引全球人才。

sentences.english: He Yafei also mentioned the negotiations on China-Australia free trade area (FTA).
sentences.chinese: 在这里还要提一下中澳自由贸易区谈判问题。

sentences.english: ROK says agrees with China to consider FTA.
sentences.chinese: 韩国称同意考虑与中国建立自由贸易区。

sentences.english: The government has set up a free-trade zone for Chinese companies.
sentences.chinese: 斯里兰卡已经为中国企业设立了一个自由贸易区。
这里是一个自由贸易区。

sentences.english: Therefore, the prospects of concluding a FTAA are not promising.
sentences.chinese: 美洲自由贸易区的前景不容乐观。

sentences.english: The approximate date for the FTAA's establishment is 2005.
sentences.chinese: 美洲自由贸易区将在2005年成立。

sentences.english: Nineteen of those FTAs are among just 16 Asian economies.
sentences.chinese: 16个亚洲经济体就建立了19个自由贸易区。

sentences.english: To build the FTAAP will never be an easy task. It requires long-term efforts.
sentences.chinese: 建成亚太自由贸易区并非易事，需要长期努力。

definition: abbr. for 自由貿易區|自由贸易区[zi4 you2 mao4 yi4 qu1]
Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
ASEAN/abbr. for 東南亞國家聯盟|东南亚国家联盟[Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 jia1 Lian2 meng2]
Greater Bay Area, established in 2017, consisting of Hong Kong, Macao and nine cities in Guangdong (abbr. for 粵港澳大灣區|粤港澳大湾区[Yue4 Gang3 Ao4 Da4 wan1 Qu1])
special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区
